properties.name: 20th Street Stairs
properties.description: Posted by Ludmilla 20th and Sanchez, San Francisco, CA 94114Some of my favorite stairs are located between Sanchez and Noe. Great views, and some lovely older architecture. (with thanks to sisterbetty.org)

properties.name: Carolina St Stairs, Potrero Hill
properties.description: Posted by Ludmilla Carolina and 20th, San Francisco, CA 94107steep half-block set of steps that links the dead-end of Carolina St to 20th St. shadey, with nice views.

properties.name: Filbert St Stairs
properties.description: Posted by Mikel1 vulcan stairway, san francisco, cathe most fantastic steps in san francisco

properties.name: Fort Mason to Maritime Park trail
properties.description: Posted by Jason   as far north on SF\'s Van Ness as you can go.A romantic dark hidden trail around the rim of a cliff that includes a nearly ruined old military stairscase running through what seem to be giant water cisterns. Very mellow place.

properties.name: Greenwich Steps
properties.description: Posted by Mikel1 vulcan stairway, san francisco, cathe equally most fantastic steps in san francisco

properties.name: Harry Street Stairs
properties.description: Posted by VizdaHarry Street doesn\'t actually exist - it\'s all stairs, supposedly it\'s one of the longest in SF but I have not verified this.

properties.name: Houston street stairs
properties.description: Posted by Jasonaccross from sfaithe map actually shows this as a connecting through street, believe me it is not. This was an oft used shortcut down to the bar directly accross columbus.

properties.name: Peralta Stairs, Bernal Heights
properties.description: Posted by Ludmilla 10 Peralta Ave, San Francisco, CA 94110This is a steep and trecherous stairway connecting the first block of Peralta Ave with Cesar Chavez below. Great place for views and mooning people on the freeway.

properties.name: Vermont Street steps
properties.description: Posted by Ludmillavermont st, san francisco, canext the the real crookedest street in the city, several sets of steps make for a hearty climb up to a park with a great view of 101 and beyond.

properties.name: Vulcan Stairway
properties.description: Posted by Mikel1 vulcan stairway, san francisco, cacosy residential stairway
